submissioninfotest.cpp

00001 #include <unittest++/UnitTest++.h>
00002 
00003 #include "lastfmlib/submissioninfo.h"
00004 
00005 #include <iostream>
00006 #include <stdexcept>
00007 
00008 using std::string;
00009 using std::logic_error;
00010 
00011 SUITE(SubmissionInfoTest)
00012 {
00013     TEST(TestgetPostDataUtf8)
00014     {
00015         SubmissionInfo info("The Artist", "Trackname", 100);
00016         info.setAlbum("An Album");
00017         info.setTrackLength(42);
00018         info.setTrackNr(4);
00019         info.setSource(SubmissionInfo::UserChosen);
00020 
00021         string expected = "&a[0]=The+Artist&t[0]=Trackname&i[0]=100"
00022                           "&o[0]=P&r[0]=&l[0]=42&b[0]=An+Album&n[0]=4&m[0]=";
00023         CHECK_EQUAL(expected, info.getPostData());
00024 
00025         info.setSource(SubmissionInfo::NonPersonalizedBroadCast);
00026         info.setRating(SubmissionInfo::Love);
00027         expected = "&a[0]=The+Artist&t[0]=Trackname&i[0]=100"
00028                    "&o[0]=R&r[0]=L&l[0]=42&b[0]=An+Album&n[0]=4&m[0]=";
00029         CHECK_EQUAL(expected, info.getPostData());
00030 
00031         info.setSource(SubmissionInfo::PersonalizedRecommendation);
00032         info.setRating(SubmissionInfo::Ban);
00033         expected = "&a[0]=The+Artist&t[0]=Trackname&i[0]=100"
00034                    "&o[0]=E&r[0]=B&l[0]=42&b[0]=An+Album&n[0]=4&m[0]=";
00035         CHECK_EQUAL(expected, info.getPostData());
00036 
00037         info.setSource(SubmissionInfo::Lastfm, "12345");
00038         info.setRating(SubmissionInfo::Skip);
00039         expected = "&a[0]=The+Artist&t[0]=Trackname&i[0]=100"
00040                    "&o[0]=L12345&r[0]=S&l[0]=42&b[0]=An+Album&n[0]=4&m[0]=";
00041         CHECK_EQUAL(expected, info.getPostData());
00042 
00043         info.setSource(SubmissionInfo::Unknown);
00044         info.setRating(SubmissionInfo::Skip);
00045         expected = "&a[1]=The+Artist&t[1]=Trackname&i[1]=100"
00046                    "&o[1]=U&r[1]=S&l[1]=42&b[1]=An+Album&n[1]=4&m[1]=";
00047         CHECK_EQUAL(expected, info.getPostData(1));
00048     }
00049 
00050     TEST(TestgetPostDataWidechar)
00051     {
00052         SubmissionInfo info(L"The Artist", L"Trackname", 100);
00053         info.setAlbum(L"An Album");
00054         info.setTrackLength(42);
00055         info.setTrackNr(4);
00056         info.setSource(SubmissionInfo::UserChosen);
00057 
00058         string expected = "&a[0]=The+Artist&t[0]=Trackname&i[0]=100"
00059                           "&o[0]=P&r[0]=&l[0]=42&b[0]=An+Album&n[0]=4&m[0]=";
00060         CHECK_EQUAL(expected, info.getPostData());
00061 
00062         info.setSource(SubmissionInfo::NonPersonalizedBroadCast);
00063         info.setRating(SubmissionInfo::Love);
00064         expected = "&a[0]=The+Artist&t[0]=Trackname&i[0]=100"
00065                    "&o[0]=R&r[0]=L&l[0]=42&b[0]=An+Album&n[0]=4&m[0]=";
00066         CHECK_EQUAL(expected, info.getPostData());
00067 
00068         info.setSource(SubmissionInfo::PersonalizedRecommendation);
00069         info.setRating(SubmissionInfo::Ban);
00070         expected = "&a[0]=The+Artist&t[0]=Trackname&i[0]=100"
00071                    "&o[0]=E&r[0]=B&l[0]=42&b[0]=An+Album&n[0]=4&m[0]=";
00072         CHECK_EQUAL(expected, info.getPostData());
00073 
00074         info.setSource(SubmissionInfo::Lastfm, "12345");
00075         info.setRating(SubmissionInfo::Skip);
00076         expected = "&a[0]=The+Artist&t[0]=Trackname&i[0]=100"
00077                    "&o[0]=L12345&r[0]=S&l[0]=42&b[0]=An+Album&n[0]=4&m[0]=";
00078         CHECK_EQUAL(expected, info.getPostData());
00079 
00080         info.setSource(SubmissionInfo::Unknown);
00081         info.setRating(SubmissionInfo::Skip);
00082         expected = "&a[1]=The+Artist&t[1]=Trackname&i[1]=100"
00083                    "&o[1]=U&r[1]=S&l[1]=42&b[1]=An+Album&n[1]=4&m[1]=";
00084         CHECK_EQUAL(expected, info.getPostData(1));
00085     }
00086 
00087     TEST(TestSubmitWithouthTrackLength)
00088     {
00089         SubmissionInfo info(L"The Artist", L"Trackname", 100);
00090         info.setAlbum(L"An Album");
00091         info.setTrackNr(4);
00092         info.setSource(SubmissionInfo::UserChosen);
00093 
00094         CHECK_THROW(info.getPostData(), logic_error);
00095     }
